title: Mea Culpa (with Ben Lake MP)
itunes:title: Mea Culpa (with Ben Lake MP)
description:
Boris Johnson offers a 'heartfelt apology' after for attending a lockdown gathering in the Downing Street garden. Ben Lake, Plaid Cymru MP for Ceredigion tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts that if he himself had broken the rules he'd have to resign. But he says the Prime Minister has weathered similar storms in the past. Plus: Can we trust the Covid numbers? Star statistician David Spiegelhalter on omicron, hospitalizations and why the data on deaths should be taken with a 'huge pinch of salt.'

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Boris Johnson offers a 'heartfelt apology' after for attending a lockdown gathering in the Downing Street garden. Ben Lake, Plaid Cymru MP for Ceredigion tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts that if he himself had broken the rules he'd have to resign. But he says the Prime Minister has weathered similar storms in the past. Plus: Can we trust the Covid numbers? Star statistician David Spiegelhalter on omicron, hospitalizations and why the data on deaths should be taken with a 'huge pinch of salt.'

itunes:author: Bloomberg
